snippet: About 70 students from an East Village high school and some parents crossed the Brooklyn Bridge to present a petition to the United States attorney’s office.
abstract: Students at East Side Community High School in Manhattan carry on with planned march to United States attorney’s office in Brooklyn despite official school support having been withdrawn; they deliver petition asking for federal charges to be brought against Daniel Pantaleo, police officer who put Eric Garner in chokehold.
lead_paragraph: About 70 students from an East Village high school and some parents crossed the Brooklyn Bridge to present a petition to the United States attorney’s office.

headline.main: Defying Ban, Students March to Brooklyn in Protest of Eric Garner Decision
headline.print_headline: Students Defy Ban to Protest Chokehold Decision

keywords.value: East Side Community High School (Manhattan, NY)
keywords.name: organizations
